info.title: Baseball - Other
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. Baseball - Other

get.summary: The baseball leagues endpoint serves as a decode f...
get.description: The baseball leagues endpoint serves as a decode for the available leagues names, abbreviations, and URI paths.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The teams endpoint will be your source for team na...
get.description: The teams endpoint will be your source for team names, locations, abbreviations, and IDs.  You can get information about a single team by including the teamId.  If you do not include a teamId, you will get all the teams for the league

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, and pitch type/velocity/location (tvl) information, where available.  The first 4 parameters (eventId, box, pbp, and tvl) are only applicable for a specific game.
 Events will also provide you with schedule data.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: MinBB Conferences: This is only for MinBB.  If you select MinBB in leaguePath dropdown above, you must select a conference unless you enter eventId or Date.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp (play-by-play) and tvl parameters.
 Default - Basic score & schedule data for the data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: tvl
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play along with pitch type, velocity, & location for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'tvl=true'.
 Default - tvl data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 This parameter is ignored if an eventId is used.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - Blank - All the games for the current week.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType. See eventTypes decode endpoint for event types specific to the selected league.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: This endpoint allows you to select schedule and sc...
get.description: This endpoint allows you to select schedule and score information for just one team.  Getting information for a single team returns only schedule and score information.  If you want detailed event information (box, pbp, tvl), refer to the endpoint example with the eventId.

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: MinBB Conferences: This is only for MinBB.  If you select MinBB in leaguePath dropdown above, you must select a conference unless you enter eventId or Date.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 This parameter is ignored if an eventId is used.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - Blank - All the games for the current week.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType. See eventTypes decode endpoint for event types specific to the selected league.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Baseball - Career stats for a single player

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType. See eventTypes decode endpoint for event types specific to the selected league.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Statistics among games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only valid in conjunction with postseason event types. See eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to the selected league.
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
 Notes: The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.  If playerId is omitted, 'enc=true' will be ignored.
  If 'enc=true', the seasonId will be ignored if included.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Baseball - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType. See eventTypes decode endpoint for event types specific to the selected league.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Statistics among games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only valid in conjunction with postseason event types. See eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to the selected league.
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Baseball - Leaders

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - returns batting average (1).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType. See eventTypes decode endpoint for event types specific to the selected league.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Statistics among games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only valid in conjunction with postseason event types. See eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to the selected league.
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Baseball - Daily Leaders

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - returns batting average (1).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 This parameter is ignored if an eventId is used.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - Blank - All the games for the current week.

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: MinBB Conferences: This is only for MinBB.  If you select MinBB in leaguePath dropdown above, you must select a conference unless you enter eventId or Date.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType. See eventTypes decode endpoint for event types specific to the selected league.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Statistics among games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only valid in conjunction with postseason event types. See eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to the selected league.
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Baseball - Probable Pitchers

parameters.name: leaguePath
parameters.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the baseball/leagues endpoint

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp (play-by-play) and tvl parameters.
 Default - Basic score & schedule data for the data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 This parameter is ignored if an eventId is used.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - Blank - All the games for the current week.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType. See eventTypes decode endpoint for event types specific to the selected league.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Statistics among games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only valid in conjunction with postseason event types. See eventRounds decode endpoint for rounds specific to the selected league.
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
